column4: i just installed ubuntu-desktop from a kubuntu 7.10 install, i'm trying to setup compiz , from preferences > appearance trying to enable the custom option i get the error "The Composite extension is not available", any ideas or suggestions would be appreciated
yes the compizconfig-settings-manager called advanced desktop effects manager I believe
Checking for Xgl: not present.  No whitelisted driver found aborting and using fallback: /usr/bin/metacity  was the result, sorry if this is something stupid i mised still new to linux in general
which video card? you may need to install the correct driver
mobility radeon x600 sorry took a min to remember
have you enabled the restricted drivers?
does it not stick between reboots?
have you tried choosing it a session? in the login screen
was unaware it was listed as a session
just a thought.. not sure it will work :}
